tool_description: Validates customer activities against business rules and eligibility criteria for point awards.
error_messages: Invalid customer_id: Customer must exist and be active in the loyalty program.
Unsupported activity_type: Activity type is not recognized by the validation system.
Invalid activity_data: Activity data format is incorrect or contains invalid values.
Customer not eligible: Customer does not meet eligibility criteria for this activity type.
Activity frequency exceeded: Customer has exceeded allowed frequency for this activity.
Invalid validation_timestamp: Timestamp must be valid ISO 8601 format.
usage: Provide customer_id, activity_type, activity_data array with relevant attributes, and validation_timestamp.

is_valid.description: Whether the activity passes all validation rules

validation_errors.description: List of validation errors if any

eligible_for_points.description: Whether activity qualifies for point award

validation_id.description: Unique identifier for this validation check
